detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Down jacket with a soft velour lining and detachable faux-fur lined hood. Zip down the front and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Fitted, asymmetric dress in mesh with gathered seams for a draped effect. Short, gathered sleeves and a visible zip at the hem. Sewn-in jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.

Baby Exclusive. Down all-in-one suit with a soft velour lining and detachable faux-fur lined hood. Diagonal zip at the front that continues down one leg and narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hems. The cuffs and hems have foldover sections to enclose the hands and feet for added warmth. Filling 80% down, 20% feather.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton with buttons at the top, crotch and down the insides of the legs.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and joggers in marled slub cotton. Top with long raglan sleeves and buttons at the top. Joggers with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative zips at the front and slim legs with seams.
Jackets in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jackets in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jackets in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Padded, quilted parka in woven fabric with a padded, mesh-lined drawstring hood. Concealed zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, diagonal chest pocket with a concealed press-stud, front flap pockets with press-studs and concealed side pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Soft, non-wired microfibre bra with lined, triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Frill trim around the cups and an elastic trim at the hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Long-sleeved body in big-hole mesh with a small stand-up collar and opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips and a microfibre lower section with a lined gusset with press-studs.
